message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. This is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Can you meet me at $10,000?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This still leaves some room for profit for me, while acknowledging your budget constraints. Let me know if this works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $10,000. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $10,250. Can you consider that?
